title: By the King. A proclamation, commanding all cashiered officers and soldiers, and other persons that cannot give a good account for their being here, to depart out of the cities of London and Westminster.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty 1660. At the Kings printing-house in Black-Friers,
notes: Dated at end: Given at the Court at Whitehall, this 17th day of December, in the Twelfth year of his Majesties Reign, 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
